Description: Very cute 1 bedroom apartment, great location in Somerville and PET FRIENDLY at no extra fee! Laundry located in the basement. 15 minute walk to Davis Square & Red Line T stop. 20 minute walk to green line stop at Medford/Tufts University. Top floor of 3 unit building. Easy to street park. Plenty of restaurants and stores located right on Broadway st. Video tour available at request.
